climbs.name: The Van der Wall
climbs.fa: JD Bagert stand start, Elmer Guardado sit start

content.description: Start on the obvious knife edge crimps in the middle of the slab and bad feet. Use the nail-sharp crimps to move upwards and right until you gain a good right-hand sidepull around the blunt arete and a good crimp up top. Finish the technical slab sequence to the top.The original send an V6 stand variation started on the good sidepull.
content.location: Slabby boulder to the right of the Big boulder with Spirit Molecule (V5) and Monkey Cage (V10).

content.description: Start on the obvious knife-edge crimps in the middle of the slab with bad feet. Climb as straight upwards as possible, with the first big move left to a big crimp and then right.
content.location: Slabby boulder to the right of the big boulder in the Spirit Area.

content.description: This is a pair of massive boulders hidden off the trail to the Half-Moon Area.
